spec_data.Name: R-caTools
spec_data.Description:
Contains several basic utility functions including: moving (rolling,
running) window statistic functions, read/write for GIF and ENVI binary
files, fast calculation of AUC, LogitBoost classifier, base64
encoder/decoder, round-off error free sum and cumsum, etc.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 07 Aug 2017 02:29:50 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Tools: moving window statistics, gif, base64, roc auc...
